title: Insurance brokers plot establishment of energy pool brokerage
desc: …as new IBAG President, Council sworn in By Elliot WILLIAMS The Insurance Brokers Association of Ghana (IBAG) is considering establishing an upstream energy pool for brokers, similar to the Ghana Oil and Gas Insurance Pool (GOGIP), which is run by a consortium of primary insurance underwriting companies domiciled in the country. title: Stephen Harper to be feted in Ottawa this week as he marks 20 years since he first became PM
desc: Former prime minister Stephen Harper is being honoured at several events in Ottawa this week ahead of the 20th anniversary of his Conservative government, which was sworn into power on Feb. 6, 2006.

title: 77% of Kenyans Say KSh50,000 NYOTA Fund Grant Is Enough to Start a Business - Infotrak Survey
desc: The NYOTA Project, supported by the World Bank, is designed to tackle youth unemployment by boosting skills, creating jobs, and encouraging savings for 820,000 vulnerable young people.

title: Vivo and Oppo’s telephoto extender comes to iPhone

title: Men develop premature heart disease earlier than women
